result.eng: Our boxers prepared intensively even though they had no trainer with them.
result.ga: D'ullmhaigh ár ndornálaithe go dian cé nach raibh traenálaí ar bith leo
result.orig: D'ullmhaigh ár ndornálaithe go dian cé nach raibh traenálaí ar bith leo
result.html: D'ullmhaigh ár ndornálaithe go dian cé nach raibh traenálaí ar bith leoOur boxers prepared intensively even though they had no trainer with them.
result.ponchtml: D'ullṁaiġ ár ndornálaiṫe go dian cé naċ raiḃ traenálaí ar biṫ leoOur boxers prepared intensively even though they had no trainer with them.

result.eng: I paid them 20 euro.
result.ga: D'íoc mé 20 euro leo
result.orig: D'íoc mé 20 euro leo
result.html: D'íoc mé 20 euro leoI paid them 20 euro.
result.ponchtml: D'íoc mé 20 euro leoI paid them 20 euro.

result.eng: They can't live without a car.
result.ga: Ní féidir leo maireachtáil gan charr
result.orig: Ní féidir leo maireachtáil gan charr
result.html: Ní féidir leo maireachtáil gan charrThey can't live without a car.
result.ponchtml: Ní féidir leo maireaċtáil gan ċarrThey can't live without a car.

result.eng: They received congratulations.
result.ga: Rinneadh comhghairdeas leo
result.orig: Rinneadh comhghairdeas leo
result.html: Rinneadh comhghairdeas leoThey received congratulations.
result.ponchtml: Rinneaḋ coṁġairdeas leoThey received congratulations.

result.eng: What about your parents? Do you get on well with them?
result.ga: Cad é faoi do thuismitheoirí An réitíonn tú go maith leo siúd
result.orig: Cad é faoi do thuismitheoirí An réitíonn tú go maith leo siúd
result.html: Cad é faoi do thuismitheoirí An réitíonn tú go maith leo siúdWhat about your parents? Do you get on well with them?
result.ponchtml: Cad é faoi do ṫuismiṫeoirí An réitíonn tú go maiṫ leo siúdWhat about your parents? Do you get on well with them?

result.eng: He disliked them immediately.
result.ga: Ghlac sé col leo ar an toirt
result.orig: Ghlac sé col leo ar an toirt
result.html: Ghlac sé col leo ar an toirtHe disliked them immediately.
result.ponchtml: Ġlac sé col leo ar an toirtHe disliked them immediately.

result.eng: They left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.
result.ga: D'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuar
result.orig: D'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuar
result.html: D'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuarThey left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaiḋ agus isteaċ leo san uisce fuarThey left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.

result.eng: There were people there, I heard them shouting, but I wasn't able to touch them.
result.ga: Bhí daoine ann chuala mé ag béiceadh iad ach ní raibh mé in ann tadhall leo
result.orig: Bhí daoine ann chuala mé ag béiceadh iad ach ní raibh mé in ann tadhall leo
result.html: Bhí daoine ann chuala mé ag béiceadh iad ach ní raibh mé in ann tadhall leoThere were people there, I heard them shouting, but I wasn't able to touch them.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí daoine ann ċuala mé ag béiceaḋ iad aċ ní raiḃ mé in ann taḋall leoThere were people there, I heard them shouting, but I wasn't able to touch them.

result.eng: I must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.
result.ga: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céanna
result.orig: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céanna
result.html: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céannaI must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ gur ḃuail mé leo uair nó ḋó ó d'iṫ muid sna bialanna céannaI must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.

result.eng: If I met them, though, I don't remember it.
result.ga: Má bhuail mé leo áfach ní cuimhin liom é
result.orig: Má bhuail mé leo áfach ní cuimhin liom é
result.html: Má bhuail mé leo áfach ní cuimhin liom éIf I met them, though, I don't remember it.
result.ponchtml: Má ḃuail mé leo áfaċ ní cuiṁin liom éIf I met them, though, I don't remember it.

result.eng: They would meet in restaurants and exchange bags that looked the same.
result.ga: Ba ghnách leo bualadh le chéile i mbialanna agus málaí a mhalartú a raibh an chuma chéanna orthu
result.orig: Ba ghnách leo bualadh le chéile i mbialanna agus málaí a mhalartú a raibh an chuma chéanna orthu
result.html: Ba ghnách leo bualadh le chéile i mbialanna agus málaí a mhalartú a raibh an chuma chéanna orthuThey would meet in restaurants and exchange bags that looked the same.
result.ponchtml: Ba ġnáċ leo bualaḋ le ċéile i mbialanna agus málaí a ṁalartú a raiḃ an ċuma ċéanna orṫuThey would meet in restaurants and exchange bags that looked the same.

result.eng: After they returned home, the Prime Minister met them.
result.ga: Tar éis dóibh filleadh abhaile bhuail an Príomh-Aire leo
result.orig: Tar éis dóibh filleadh abhaile bhuail an Príomh-Aire leo
result.html: Tar éis dóibh filleadh abhaile bhuail an Príomh-Aire leoAfter they returned home, the Prime Minister met them.
result.ponchtml: Tar éis dóiḃ filleaḋ aḃaile ḃuail an Príoṁ-Aire leoAfter they returned home, the Prime Minister met them.

result.eng: They remembered the priests going from farm to farm.
result.ga: Ba chuimhin leo na sagairt ag dul ó fheirm go feirm
result.orig: Ba chuimhin leo na sagairt ag dul ó fheirm go feirm
result.html: Ba chuimhin leo na sagairt ag dul ó fheirm go feirmThey remembered the priests going from farm to farm.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċuiṁin leo na sagairt ag dul ó ḟeirm go feirmThey remembered the priests going from farm to farm.

result.eng: Everybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.
result.ga: Deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an Uachtaráin John F Kennedy
result.orig: Deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an Uachtaráin John F Kennedy
result.html: Deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an Uachtaráin John F KennedyEverybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.
result.ponchtml: Deir gaċ éinne a ḃí beo i 1963 gur cuiṁin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar ċuala siad faoi ḋúnṁarú an Uaċtaráin John F KennedyEverybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.

result.eng: Did they succeed?
result.ga: Ar éirigh leo
result.orig: Ar éirigh leo
result.html: Ar éirigh leoDid they succeed?
result.ponchtml: Ar éiriġ leoDid they succeed?

result.eng: There are both facts and judgement in what I have just said. I stand behind them both.
result.ga: Tá idir fhíricí agus bhreithiúnas sa mhéid sin Seasaim leo araon
result.orig: Tá idir fhíricí agus bhreithiúnas sa mhéid sin Seasaim leo araon
result.html: Tá idir fhíricí agus bhreithiúnas sa mhéid sin Seasaim leo araonThere are both facts and judgement in what I have just said. I stand behind them both.
result.ponchtml: Tá idir ḟíricí agus ḃreiṫiúnas sa ṁéid sin Seasaim leo araonThere are both facts and judgement in what I have just said. I stand behind them both.

result.eng: There'd be no point for you or me talking to them.
result.ga: Ní bheadh gar domhsa nó duitse a bheith ag caint leo
result.orig: Ní bheadh gar domhsa nó duitse a bheith ag caint leo
result.html: Ní bheadh gar domhsa nó duitse a bheith ag caint leoThere'd be no point for you or me talking to them.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃeaḋ gar doṁsa nó duitse a ḃeiṫ ag caint leoThere'd be no point for you or me talking to them.

result.eng: In the winter the two of them would build little dams in the streams.
result.ga: Sa gheimhreadh ba ghnách leo ina mbeirt stopalláin a dhéanamh sna srutháin
result.orig: Sa gheimhreadh ba ghnách leo ina mbeirt stopalláin a dhéanamh sna srutháin
result.html: Sa gheimhreadh ba ghnách leo ina mbeirt stopalláin a dhéanamh sna srutháinIn the winter the two of them would build little dams in the streams.
result.ponchtml: Sa ġeiṁreaḋ ba ġnáċ leo ina mbeirt stopalláin a ḋéanaṁ sna sruṫáinIn the winter the two of them would build little dams in the streams.

result.eng: Three women were wading through the snow.
result.ga: Bhí triúr ban ag spágáil leo fríd an tsneachta
result.orig: Bhí triúr ban ag spágáil leo fríd an tsneachta
result.html: Bhí triúr ban ag spágáil leo fríd an tsneachtaThree women were wading through the snow.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí triúr ban ag spágáil leo fríd an tsneaċtaThree women were wading through the snow.

result.eng: They were walking quietly and tiredly. But not Jamie: he was young, fit and quick.
result.ga: Bhí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostach Níorbh é sin do Shéimí é bhí sé óg lúfar gasta
result.orig: Bhí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostach Níorbh é sin do Shéimí é bhí sé óg lúfar gasta
result.html: Bhí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostach Níorbh é sin do Shéimí é bhí sé óg lúfar gastaThey were walking quietly and tiredly. But not Jamie: he was young, fit and quick.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostaċ Níorḃ é sin do Ṡéimí é ḃí sé óg lúfar gastaThey were walking quietly and tiredly. But not Jamie: he was young, fit and quick.
